Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Prepare a baking sheet by greasing and flouring it.

Beat the egg yolks and 3/8 cup of white sugar in a medium bowl until thick and pale. Add flour and salt, stir until smooth, then mix in the vanilla. Whip egg whites in a separate bowl until firm peaks form, then fold into the egg yolk mixture until fully combined.

Sprinkle half of the mixture gets sprinkled over the tops of the strips and let them stand for 10 minutes. Afterwards, sprinkle the remaining sugar mixture over them and let them stand for another 5 minutes.
Bake until golden, for about 10 minutes. Cool on a wire rack.
